channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Judge orders daily meetings with Border Patrol official Bovino on Chicago immigration crackdown
item.description: A federal judge has ordered a senior U.S. Border Patrol official to meet her daily “to hear about how the day went” after weeks of confrontations between immigration agents and the public in the Chicago area.

item.title: Chicago’s children are getting caught in the chaos of immigration crackdowns
Jury deliberations start in trial of Illinois deputy who killed Sonya Massey
